scripts.build:ios: ./scripts/runWithVars.sh 'mkdir -p ./cordova-app/www/ && cp -a ./build/* ./cordova-app/www/ && cd cordova-app && cordova platform rm ios && cordova platform add ios && cordova build ios --prod --release --device --buildConfig build.json && cd ..'
scripts.build:ios:dev: ./scripts/runWithVars.sh 'mkdir -p ./cordova-app/www/ && cp -a ./build/* ./cordova-app/www/ && cd cordova-app && cordova build ios --debug --buildFlag="-UseModernBuildSystem=0" && cd ..'
scripts.build:android: ./scripts/runWithVars.sh 'mkdir -p ./cordova-app/www/ && cp -a ./build/* ./cordova-app/www/ && cd cordova-app && cordova platform rm android && cordova platform add android && cordova build android --prod --release --buildConfig build.json && cd ..'
scripts.build:android:dev: ./scripts/runWithVars.sh 'mkdir -p ./cordova-app/www/ && cp -a ./build/* ./cordova-app/www/ && cd cordova-app && cordova build android && cd ..'
